title: Alimens & Gentle Men's Short Sleeve Oxford Shirt Regular Fit Button Down Collar Shirts with Pocket
description: Material: This shirt made of high quality cotton, breathable and wrinkle resistant, keep you looking fresh all day. The oxford fabric will get softer with every wear
Design: The mens short sleeve shirt features back pleat and button-front of the shirt for a tailored look and more flexibility on the move; a left chest pocket to store your essentials
Match: The men's solid oxford shirts with buttoned collar are easy to match. The top button can be opened for a relaxed, casual everyday vibe, or it can be tied with a tie for a classic business look
Occasions: Casual/ Dating/ Work/ Travel/ Party/ Daily life, perfect for any casual occasions. Perfect gift for husband, son, dad, brother, friends, or colleagues
Easy Care: Hand wash or machine wash cold. Tumble dry low, low iron if necessary
